Class ShopController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ShopController
public class ShopController extends Object
The ShopController class manages the user interface and interactions for the in-game shop. It provides functionality to display items, handle purchases, switch between item categories, and manage shopkeeper dialogues.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    List<Item>
    currentList
    The list of items currently being displayed.

    • populateShopItems

      public void populateShopItems(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane container, List<Item> items)
      Populates the shop UI with items in the current list, displaying them in a grid layout.
      Parameters:
      container - the GridPane where items will be displayed
      items - the list of items to display

    • getBalance

      public void getBalance()
      Retrieves the player's current balance from the shop and updates the balance label.

    • handlePurchaseItem

      public void handlePurchaseItem(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the purchase of the selected item. Checks if the player has enough balance and updates the UI accordingly. If the purchase is successful, deducts the price and updates the balance.
      Parameters:
      event - the MouseEvent triggered by clicking the purchase button

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane getRoot()
      Returns the root AnchorPane of the shop UI.
      Returns:
      the root AnchorPane
